review: It works very well, and the remote control is very well designed and useful.  Netflix works very well on it.However, I don't like it as much as the Chromecast because there are many smartphone apps that work well with the Chromecast.  The only things you can really do with your smartphone on the Fire Stick is mirroring (which is displaying your cell phone screen onto a TV), and remote control.  However, mirroring does not work as well as I would like.As a stand alone item, the Fire Stick is great, because you can download games/apps directly onto it and use them from it.  But if it were easier to pair with a smartphone and use applications from there, I would give it 5 stars.
author: A. Nasri

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick is pretty awesome. It has a fluid design, kind of like Roku 2 but way smoother. Reminds me of using my friends PS4's Netflix app in a way. One thing that I do find very annoying and wish that Amazon will remedy with a future update is the parental and purchase lock code you can set in place. When you choose to have a code required for purchase and viewing restrictions it applies to all titles. Meaning anything you select to watch or download will require a pass code. It becomes very tedious, and is something that could be easily fixed. I wish they would have the same options as they do when you register a console, select what content is appropriate to watch and restrict purchases on your Amazon account. I have a child, and bought this device primarily to be used by the whole family in our living room.

author: K. Bryant

review: I have nothing but good things to say about the Fire TV Stick! I cannot compare it to the Fire TV, because I've only used these... but I have two now, and I use them 1) on an older tv that is not a smart tv and 2) on a newer tv that I purposefully bought as a non-smart tv because I knew I'd be using a Fire TV Stick with it. My daughter benefits from this device every day and night. She watches all of her favorite cartoons thanks to the availability of Netflix and even a little Amazon Prime Video! It comes with Amazon Prime for a certain amount of time included, can't remember how much. I've always been a prime member, and this device was no exception to my satisfaction with Amazon and its own line of products! Thanks, Amazon! Keep up the good work!
